decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 04/10/2026.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 24/05/24 LBI ref: P2023/2160/FUL.  Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
description: Variation of Condition 2 (DRAWINGS AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS) and removal of condition 4 (Prior to the commence of development, details regarding the foundation design including plans and section as well as a method of installation shall be submitted and agreed to in writing by the Local Planning Authority) of planning permission Ref: P2023/2160/FUL Single-storey garden outbuilding with attached bike store with replacement seating area, dated 04 October 2023. The application seeks to amend the size and cladding of the proposed outbuilding and rearrangement of seating area.
